name: A Bizarre day
description:
I probably won't update this game anymore. but if it blows up i might. 

EPIC showcase

arrow keys to move

space to change time 

a to rage

b to dab

c to thanos snap

d to go to shadow relm

e is to go MUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDAMUDA

f is to fire thingy

This is an old game I made it back in 2020 when I first started playing A Bizarre Day. 

Game: https://www.roblox.com/games/2686500207/A-Bizarre-Day. (Roblox)
